Validate your account with \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:ddzhumaev@slb.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Dmitry Dzhumaev\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", this is a Russian speaking support engineer from SLB. Send him an email like “Please validate my LDAP record”. Then you will have a video call in teams with him where you will have to provide either your passport of ID card.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2. Setup MFA. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ATTENTION!!!\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" You will need to have SLB VPN (GlobalProtect) turned on, but it can’t be configured without MFA. So you will need to ask your colleague or delivery manager for help here. With VPN turned on using colleague’s computer login to the portal with SLB credentials: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://mysignins.microsoft.com/security-info\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://mysignins.microsoft.com/security-info\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Video instructions:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/uWbkLuI4g30.\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In case of issues call support and tell that you can’t configure MFA by yourself. Tell them that Global Protect VPN is not configured either because it requires MFA.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://slb001.sharepoint.com/sites/ICRM/SitePages/Azure-MFA-Privacy-FAQs.aspx?CT=1616779249713&OR=OWA-NT&CID=d043cff8-dae3-20e8-d4bf-ad70aa8b4039\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Issues with Microsoft MFA\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3. There may be a lag (~3 hours) after or between points 1 and 2 when the credentials will not work. Just try later if this is the case. If the creds don’t work after 4 hours – talk to your contact point from EPAM (it could be a DM, project member, who is helping you, or administrative assistant).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"4. Go to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://enr.gateway.slb.com/global-protect/login.esp\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://enr.gateway.slb.com/global-protect/login.esp\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Enter your credentials. After you click log in the form will disappear, but you should check the “Authenticator” app on your phone, because you should get a login request to approve.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"5. You should see the screen below.
